title: SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_TIRE_COLLIDER_SIZE
content:
0xB962D05C// SetVehicleWheelTireColliderSize
void SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_TIRE_COLLIDER_SIZE(Vehicle vehicle, int wheelIndex, float value);Parameters:vehicle: The vehicle to obtain data for.wheelIndex: Index of wheel, 0-3.value: Radius of tire collider.Use along with SetVehicleWheelSize to resize the wheels (this native sets the collider size affecting physics while SetVehicleWheelSize will change visual size).
codeBlocks:
// SetVehicleWheelTireColliderSize
void SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_TIRE_COLLIDER_SIZE(Vehicle vehicle, int wheelIndex, float value);

local ped = PlayerPedId()
local vehicle = GetVehiclePedIsIn(ped, false)
-- Example usage for SET_VEHICLE_WHEEL_TIRE_COLLIDER_SIZE
SetVehicleWheelTireColliderSize(vehicle, 0, 0.0)
